| Property        | Attribute        | Description | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |

| `pageElements`  | `page-elements`  |             | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `pageNumber`    | `page-number`    |             | `number`  | `1`         |
| `pageSize`      | `page-size`      |             | `number`  | `10`        |
| `totalElements` | `total-elements` |             | `number`  | `0`         |
